General.Name: Talkweb Information System Co Ltd
General.Description: Talkweb Information System Co.,Ltd. provides education services and mobile games in China. It offers examination paper marking and education evaluation services; online marking services for college entrance and high schools entrance examination, and traditional large-scale examinations. The company also provides smart campus solutions for schools; and software cloud services. In addition, it researches, develops, and distributes mobile games. The company was founded in 1996 and is based in Changsha, China.
General.Address: No. 298, Tongzipo West Road, Changsha, China, 410205

3.Name: Ms. Qi  Long
